author: serge
msg: Removed synchronization, added use of writing to temporary files to ensure data cannot be lost, and added sleeps after deletes and checks that deletion completes before moving on (File.delete is multithreaded at either JVM or [NT] OS level)

author: matt
msg: Added a missing interface for the pooled protocol handler.

author: matt
msg: Added support for command handlers and the command handler classes to support
basic SMTP traffic.  Also created support for Protocol Handler pools and pools

author: scoobie
msg: Draft doc on porting James under the Avalon framework
